title: How Do I Forgive My Dead Husband?
description:
Kathy's husband killed himself five years ago, and she wonders if she can ever forgive him for destroying their life together. Dr. Laura: "The brains of the profoundly depressed lack the chemicals to be rational or considerate of others."

Have you ever struggled to forgive someone? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
